title: What role do you main?
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=95VUDShLB-k

Recently on All Chat, the hosts had an animated discussion about main roles and role-swapping for the new season. But we wanted to know your thoughts too, so Xell asked the [Twitter community](https://twitter.com/LoLXell/status/675419048658636801) to weigh in with their perspective. Check out a few of our favorite responses below and tell us what role is your favorite and why!


#These guys are all about doing what it takes to secure a win. 

https://i.imgur.com/fJwTQMR.png

http://i.imgur.com/SNlcGtp.png

#Sometimes it’s just about being the best.

http://i.imgur.com/VYKVePK.png

http://i.imgur.com/glTtNtt.png

http://i.imgur.com/w1Suoe8.png

#But some got a little too honest….

http://i.imgur.com/uwca8q4.png

http://i.imgur.com/HENxDxE.png

http://i.imgur.com/P0jqd7E.png

http://i.imgur.com/15KjyQA.png

http://i.imgur.com/CpQZImZ.png

replies.body:
I used to main AP Midlane.
If you'll excuse me, I'm going to go weep profusely for awhile.
same.
I used to be one too, until I took an arrow to the knee.
Yeah... Mid lane Varus can be kind of strong sometimes.
With over 2000 ARAM games I guess I'm a mid lane main :D
Jungle, because I'm a masochist who secretly likes verbal abuse

I just recently joined the legion of Teemo mains...

Does that make me a terrible person?

> [{quoted}](name=GhastlyGhoulMan,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=18ma9Izg,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-12-18T19:21:56.066+0000)
>
> I just recently joined the legion of Teemo mains...
> 
> Does that make me a terrible person?

Yes. Yes it does.

> [{quoted}](name=GhastlyGhoulMan,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=18ma9Izg,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-12-18T19:21:56.066+0000)
>
> I just recently joined the legion of Teemo mains...
> 
> Does that make me a terrible person?

i main teemo so hard i can play him all 5 roles with no problems rofl

I never lose my lane,
Cuz im a Jungle Main.
       -Me, 2015
I main Support cause I cant trust anyone to ward.
i used to main adc when graves had a cigar{{item:3070}}
Jack of all trades, a.k.a. Main fill
someone gotta fill and carry {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
AYE! Same here!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I'm a support main because there is nothing more satisfying than crushing the hopes and dreams of those who underestimate you.
Support 4 lyfe. {{champion:143}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:40}}
Have I told you about our lord and savior teemo?

WHERE MY ADC MAINS AT
{{champion:18}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:236}}
hybrid bard top main
Azir main since his release here ^_^

Azir is awesome! I love his VO. 

{{champion:268}}  "SHURIMA! YOUR EMPEROR HAS RETURNED!"

Also who doesn't love the Shurima shuffle? :3

And also also  he's a bird... sooo... :D
Calm down' rainslight I don't want you to get your feathers in a ruffle!
http://imgur.com/XHdeuBM

{{champion:34}}  {{champion:50}} 
Kinda forgetting some birds...

Never said he was best birb 

<3 {{champion:34}}

Support main but I play mid more in Solo Q cause my mid laners always feed >.>

Also, <3 {{champion:267}}
Yes, spread the Nami love. <3{{champion:267}}
Top Lane because i don't have to rely on anybody but myself {{item:3070}}
ib4 you cry out "when you gonna gank me jungle?!"  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

I main Support.

Because a hero can be anyone. Even a Support doing something as simple and reassuring as putting a coat around a young ADC's shoulders to let him or her know that the world hadn't ended.

Maining roles is for trolls.

Edit:

But it RHYMED
Top lane because its just you another person farming until the entire team tunnel vision's me then I laugh because I'm {{champion:27}}
I main Support because I need a buddy in lane, let's be friends forever. Even though I play thresh and should be harvesting your soul not becoming friends.

I'm a bot lane main, swapping between AD and support depending on pick order (draft) or what I feel like at the time (Team Builder). Bard and Lucian respectively. Currently Mastery 5 on Luc and 4 on Bard.

The reason behind the ADC main is that Lucian is one of my favorite champs personality wise on ONE end of the personality spectrum (cold, hard badass).

I started playing bard because he was just SO FLUFFY HOW CAN I NOT PLAY HIM, and then I like him.

P.S Can you shoot the skins team a message for how good Snow Day Bard is? I liek penguins :3
Hell yes, Bard main! That's cool that you play both bot lane roles. It probably makes you stronger at both roles to understand the bot lane synergy better.

supports are love <3
tanks for life

I main feeder because I'm really good at it.
I'M NOT JOKING!!!!
Pref mid, can fill
Yeah! Midlane and fill! Who's your go to champ? :3
I love me some tentacle squid! Vel'koz is my go to champ in 90% of situations. I also love playing Lux and Twisted Fate!
Vel'Koz is one of my favs too! His learning laser is so much fun ^^
I main Support because I'm a healer not a fighter.
breh i dont main. i just pick and pray tbh. although at one point it was mid cho...?
Support, because someone has to do the dirty jobs :3

Exploding Tree mid main
{{champion:57}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3135}}
It's all about support. Because sight stone and t1 boots is the most op build in the game bar none.
Fill main, because I like playing a little bit of every role and still being better than the people who "main" them.

I play adc because doublelift. I LOVE YOU DOUBLELIFT

I also used to like clg but now I like TSM cuz of doublelift.

DID I MENTION DOUBLE UR MY IDOL
